question_text:
Question 57 
 
 
Power System 
 
A 20 MVA, 11.2 kV, 4-pole, 50 Hz alternator has an inertia constant of 15 MJ/MVA. If the input and 
output powers of the alternator are 15 MW and 10 MW, respectively, the angular acceleration in
2
s
  is _______. (round off to nearest integer)
mechanical degree/
